Text: Copying crack into directory and overwriting existing file before launching the application did not work! Program acts like a "trial version" and leaves watermarks. Yep!

TorDigger 
Thanks could you tell me where we can find serials for this version because with the serials  the convertxtodvd works better than crack.

Never trust so-called "cracks".  Sure, they can do something to bypass a software program prompt for serial number, but at the same time, potential exploit aka trojan horse can be planted to your system.  Serial is the safest I should say.
